fr.ecp.IS1220.group5.project

Class MyFoodoraSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.ecp.IS1220.group5.project.MyFoodoraSystem

  • public class MyFoodoraSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    MyFoodoraSystem is the class managing the whole system.

    This class stores:

    • The registered users (managers, restaurants, customers and couriers)
    • The history of completed orders
    • Profit-related information
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    alexandre01, dennis101251

        public void chooseRestaurant(java.lang.String restaurant)

      • setNotified

        public void setNotified(java.lang.String string)
        Changes the notification status of a customer.
        • On: to receive messages from MyFooddora
        • Off: to disable notifications.
        Parameters:
        string - "on" if the customer wants to be notified, "off" if he doesn't.
